trans-unit.source: Manage your Azure MFA settings in the Office 365 portal
trans-unit.target: Manage your Azure MFA settings in the Office 365 portal

trans-unit.source: This page will show users where in the Office 365 portal they need to go to manage their Azure MFA settings.
trans-unit.target: This page will show users where in the Office 365 portal they need to go to manage their Azure MFA settings.

trans-unit.source: Manage your Azure Multi-Factor Authentication settings in the Office 365 portal
trans-unit.target: Manage your Azure Multi-Factor Authentication settings in the Office 365 portal

trans-unit.source: If you use multi-factor authentication with Office 365 you will want to manage your additional security verification settings through the Office 365 portal.
trans-unit.target: If you use multi-factor authentication with Office 365 you will want to manage your additional security verification settings through the Office 365 portal.

trans-unit.source: To access additional security verification settings in the Office 365 portal
trans-unit.target: To access additional security verification settings in the Office 365 portal

trans-unit.source: At the top, click the icon that looks like a little cog.
trans-unit.target: At the top, click the icon that looks like a little cog.

trans-unit.source: This will display a drop-down that says Office 365 settings.
trans-unit.target: This will display a drop-down that says Office 365 settings.

trans-unit.source: This will open the settings page.
trans-unit.target: This will open the settings page.

trans-unit.source: On the left, click additional security verification.
trans-unit.target: On the left, click additional security verification.

trans-unit.source: On the right, click the link that says Update my phone numbers used for account security.
trans-unit.target: On the right, click the link that says Update my phone numbers used for account security.

trans-unit.source: This will redirect you to a new page.
trans-unit.target: This will redirect you to a new page.

trans-unit.source: You will have to verify how you are again using either your phone or the mobile app
trans-unit.target: You will have to verify how you are again using either your phone or the mobile app

trans-unit.source: Once this completes you should be on the proof-up page and you can change your settings.
trans-unit.target: Once this completes you should be on the proof-up page and you can change your settings.
